aboutme-info1: I'm a German Front-End Developer based in Bavaria. I'm skilled in crafting responsive web applications and websites using JavaScript and Angular.
aboutme-info2: I've created landing pages, versatile web applications and object-oriented jump-and-run games using these advanced technologies. Please take a look at some of my projects on this website.
aboutme-info3: Are you seeking a problem solver? Throughout my dynamic career, I gathered a lot of experience in identifying and analyzing issues in complex IT environments.
aboutme-info4: Do you look for a team player? During my training, I collaborated on several group projects, leveraging my experience from working on international marketing and IT projects.
skills-info1: I have acquired valuable skills in frontend development, including proficiency in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. My experience with frameworks like Angular and Bootstrap allows me to create responsive and user-friendly applications. Committed to continuous learning, I stay updated with the latest technologies to enhance my development capabilities.
skills-info3: Feel free to contact me. I look forward to expanding on my previous knowledge.
skills-info7: interest in learning react and python
portfolio-info1: Explore a selection of my work here - Interact with projects to see my skills in action.
portfolio-info2: Stay tuned — more innovative projects are underway!
portfolio-project-text1: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.
portfolio-project-text2: A simple Jump-and-Run game based on an object-oriented approach. Help Pepe to find coins and tabasco salsa to fight against the crazy hen.
portfolio-project-text3: Based on the PokéAPI a simple library that provides and catalogues pokemon information.

ingolf.text: Jenny is an exceptional teammate who works with remarkable efficiency and speed. Her collaborative nature makes working with her a great pleasure, as she consistently delivers high-quality results.

anna.text: Jenny is an amazing colleague. Her attention to detail and ability to communicate effectively make her an invaluable team member.

contact-info2: Contact me through this form, I am interested in hearing you, knowing your ideas and contributing to your projects with my work.
